pages.text: Consumes food in your inventory (although not in your off-hand), rapidly filling your hunger and saturation, although the amount of hunger filled and saturation gained is significantly less than would be obtained by eating the items.$(br2)$(info) Foods with potion effects, such as golden apples, will have them applied, although generally these will not stack.$(br2)$(warning) Foods with the highest saturation value are considered first. Saturation can and will be wasted in order to completely fill hunger.
